admission_requirements.summary: This text outlines a six-step process for international students to study in India. It includes registering for a Student ID (SII ID) to track their journey, exploring over 8,000 courses across 600+ Indian institutes, receiving and accepting offer letters, applying for a Visa or Student E-Visa with the SII ID for expedited processing, and registering with E-FRRO/FRRO within 14 days of arrival in India, also utilizing the SII ID.
admission_requirements.raw_content:
6 Steps to Study in India
Register & get SII ID
Compulsory ID to track foreign student journey in India
Explore from 8000+ Courses
In more than 600+ Indian Institutes
Directly to all Institutions simultaneously
Get Multiple Offer letters
Accept the offer letter best suited to you
Apply for Visa /Student E-Visa
With your SII ID & get fast tracked visa
Register for E-FRRO/ FRRO
Within 14 days of landing in India with SII ID
